name: City Car Driving School 2018
description:
Latest Release by Gears in motion games

City Car Driving School 2018

Can you drive a car but do not know much about traffic & driving rules. Well this is the right place for you. Drive over 11 exotic super cars in the city and learn over 40 different driving rules. Along with driving lessons we have developed our game in such a manner that user can modify his own vehicle. You can modify your vehicle's as you like.

They can easily change wheel rims available up to 10 types of different hot wheels. You can easily change the body color, tire smoke color, rim color. Give your vehicle a dashing look by adjusting its height, rear wheel camber and front wheel camber.

Features:
- 11 heavy power vehicles
-Car customization to give your vehicle a visual overhaul
-Over 10 different wheel rims
-Body Colors
-Wheel rim color Changer
-Car Suspension (Rear Camber, Front Camber, Vehicle Height)
-And much more

In-Game Languages:
-English
-Chinese
-French
-German
-Spanish
-Russian
-Japanese
